title: 1 rp off from a mystery skin
body: I just need 1 rp to mystery gift someone any help?

replies.body: We might be bale to help out here.  :D  Draw me a picture of a poro enjoying the fall season, and they might heed your request!

a "bale" is a large ream of a grassy plant, usually forced together by machine nowadays, and wrapped with twine to prevent it from coming apart. Bales are often made of straw, hay, cotton and other grains like alfalfa.

Bales are primarily used to feed livestock, and it is a standard unit of measurement in the farming world.
Does he mean able or bale?

> [{quoted}](name=Poro Sky,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BEw3cbqE,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-01T21:03:32.511+0000)
>
> Does he mean able or bale?

I suspect he meant able, but you asked what a bale was.
I feel bad. But a PORO can be your friend.ðŸ˜€
https://puu.sh/xNa1s.png my poor excuse for a pile of leaves i tried xD
